slop.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: if liquid slops somewhere, it moves around or over the edge of a container in an uncontrolled way
slop.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: Coffee slopped over the rim of her cup.
With each wave, more water slopped into the cabin.
slop.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: to put a liquid somewhere in a careless way
slop.translation[0].definitions[1].examp: She put the glass down, slopping beer onto the table.
slop.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: waste food that can be used to feed animals
slop.translation[1].definitions[1].examp: Prisoners had to use slop buckets at night.
slop.translation[1].definitions[2].defin: food that is too soft and tastes bad
slop.translation[1].definitions[2].examp: Do you actually expect us to eat this slop?
